summary: Tells the story of Joshua Milton Blahyi - aka General Butt Naked - a brutal warlord who murdered thousands during Liberia's horrific 14-year civil war. Today, the General has renounced his ... See full summary Â»
cast: Joshua Milton Blahyi Jr.|Janice Blahyi|Joshua Blahyi|Josie Blahyi|Makayla Blahyi|Sartee Bropleh|Samuel K. Doe|Emmanuel|David Johnson|Prince Yormi Johnson|John Kun Kun|Lovetta|Dekhanso McCarthy
title: The Redemption of General Butt Naked
